verses.roman:
kṣetrāṇāṁ caiva sarveṣāṁ
yathā kāśī hy anuttamā
tathā purāṇa-vrātānāṁ
śrīmad-bhāgavataṁ dvijāḥ

synonyms: kṣetrāṇām—of holy places; ca—and; eva—indeed; sarveṣām—of all; yathā—as; kāśī—Benares; hi—indeed; anuttamā—unexcelled; tathā—thus; purāṇa-vrātānām—of all the Purāṇas; śrīmat-bhāgavatam—Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam; dvijāḥ—O brāhmaṇas.
translation: O brāhmaṇas, in the same way that the city of Kāśī is unexcelled among holy places, Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam is supreme among all the Purāṇas.
